pageContext.claim: “[Taylor] is a Never Trumper, and his lawyer is a Never Trumper.”
pageContext.analysis: There’s no evidence that any of the impeachment hearing witnesses — including former U.S. ambassador to Ukraine Marie Yovanovitch, current ambassador to Ukraine Bill Taylor, state department officials George Kent, David Holmes and David Hale, national security aides Army Lt. Col. Alexander Vindman, Fiona Hill and Jennifer Williams or former U.S. special envoy to Ukraine Kurt Volker — are or were “never Trumpers.” Many people who testified were recruited to serve in his administration or had served multiple presidents from both parties. A key witness was Ambassador Gordon Sondland, who contributed $1 million to Trump's inauguration.
